CustomField.description: Gets the name of the Owner of the RCP record, whether it is a Queue or User. Used for Process Builder flow 'Update Opportunity NCS Name from RCP'
CustomField.formula: If( Owner:User.Id <> null,Owner:User.FirstName &" "& Owner:User.LastName,If( Owner:Queue.Id <> null, Owner:Queue.QueueName ,null))
CustomField.label: NCS Name
